title: Grove Avenue shooting under investigation
content:
RICHMOND, Va. — Police are investigating an accidental shooting reported on Grove Avenue, near Woodlawn Avenue, in Richmond’s West End.
Neighbors along the 4300 block of Grove Avenue saw a truck pull into a parking lot, then heard a single gun shot.
EMS arrives after neighbors called 911 and rushed the person in the truck to the hospital.
That person’s condition has not yet been released.
A Richmond Police spokesperson referred to the incident as an “accidental shooting.”
This is a developing story. Submit a news tip here.
